artist: Maker: Karl Kempton; Printer: Philip Gallo; Publisher: Hermetic Press, Minneapolis
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: small solid and open circles in a geometrical configuration of varying sizes of rectangles with the letters "PO" and "EM" spelling out "poem" two times around the outside of the rectangular forms starting in the upper right; stored with four other prints in an orange Canson folder with "5 Visual Poems / scott helmes karl kempton ian hamilton finlay philip gallo jonathan williams" in letterpress on front
title: 5 Visual Poems
